name: add-to-feedly-plus
title: Add to Feedly Plus
description: This extension allows you to add your favorite sites' feeds to Feedly. Despite from original add-on this one handles multiple RSS feeds too.
author: Petr Ermishkin <quasiyoke@gmail.com> (https://quasiyoke.me)

scripts.build: ./etc/build.ts && web-ext build --filename add_to_feedly_plus.zip --overwrite-dest --ignore-files=etc src package*.json tsconfig.json **/*.md *.ts
scripts.check: npm run check:types && npm run lint:eslint && npm run check:format && npm run build && npm run lint:web-ext
scripts.lint:web-ext: unzip -o web-ext-artifacts/add_to_feedly_plus.zip -d web-ext-artifacts/add_to_feedly_plus && web-ext lint --source-dir web-ext-artifacts/add_to_feedly_plus --warnings-as-errors
